column4: Anybody willing to help me install my webcam? (will allow remote desktop if they want) I've googled the hell out of this shit.
I could really use some help installing my webcam :D
I'll allow remote desktop if anyone wants to poke around.
searched by usb id and all.
My webcam wont work. Under all programs it says there aren't any Camera devices but is under lsusb
Bus 002 Device 004: ID 046d:0870 Logitech, Inc. QuickCam Express
I've tried cheese, Camorama, Guvcview, ummm
There is some program called webcamstudio. test that one
